Text: CXY Energy Marketing and Enron Online Cc Thank you for you phonecall and getting back to me so quickly This email is to confirm that you will be providing CXY with a letter that clarifies a few issues that were we were uncomfortable with in the Electronic Trading Agreement for Enron Online We would like clarification that the Master Agreement already entered into between the parties will govern all aspects of any physical trades made online including those respecting transaction procedures Particularly we would ask that you acknowledge that Enron shall continue to send confirmations for each and every Transaction Although we understand that the key password holder has the ability to cancel passwords we would like the ability over and above that as a company to be able to notify you and have you cancel passwords or to terminate the online trading agreement completely As it is drafted only Enron has the ability to terminate As we do not yet have the ability to use electronic signatures notices must be sent as set out in the Master Agreement or the ISDA which we appear to be close to signing Thank you again for your assistance with these issues and we look forward to receiving your letter The traders are now happy Susan Schulli atthtm

CXY Energy Marketing and Enron Online Cc Thank you for you phonecall and getting back to me so quickly This email is to confirm that you will be providing CXY with a letter that clarifies a few issues that were we were uncomfortable with in the Electronic Trading Agreement for Enron Online We would like clarification that the Master Agreement already entered into between the parties will govern all aspects of any physical trades made online including those respecting transaction procedures Particularly we would ask that you acknowledge that Enron shall continue to send confirmations for each and every Transaction Although we understand that the key password holder has the ability to cancel passwords we would like the ability over and above that as a company to be able to notify you and have you cancel passwords or to terminate the online trading agreement completely As it is drafted only Enron has the ability to terminate As we do not yet have the ability to use electronic signatures notices must be sent as set out in the Master Agreement or the ISDA which we appear to be close to signing Thank you again for your assistance with these issues and we look forward to receiving your letter The traders are now happy Susan Schulli atthtm
